title: Add a live star-history chart to your GitHub README
author: Steven
excerpt: Now we support embedding a live Issue History chart into your GitHub README. This feature is quite handy. A snippet would appear after querying the repository from our issue-history.twenty.com main page; the only thing you need to do is simply copy that snippet into your GitHub README markdown file.

title: Introducing the new issue-history.twenty.com
